name: Cybertron
description: Cybertron is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With a forest green box body and classic buttons, Cybertron stands tall with soldier-like arms and legs. Its screen is a striking combination of red and black, displaying data and information with precision. To enhance its vision, Cybertron is equipped with a pair of sleek glasses. This robot is a powerhouse, ready to tackle any task with its exceptional ability scores and skills.
